attributes.action: relesae additional funding to Mychoise Homebuy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'makeavailable, and transparent, additional funding toMyChoiceHomebuy scheme' This scheme to allow keyworkers to purchase their home has runout of funding, meaning hundreds of applicants have been leftstranded. Many have begun the process only to be told funds allocated have been withdrawn, meaning sales have fallenthrough. This has left both buyers and vendors in untenablepositions. Please sign to ask for additinal funding to be madeon this scheme.

Get first time buyers on the ladder and kickstart the economic revoery!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
